title: Сделка
overview: Alla and Lyuda have been friends for a long time. Both women are successful, attractive and rich. They trust each other like no one else, and they cope with all difficulties together. But suddenly Alla has big problems at work. An unknown client makes a deal: he takes out a loan for five cars and disappears with the cars and the money. Alla is on the verge of ruin. Who is this mysterious client?It turns out that Alla's best friend has become an accomplice in the scam. Alla cannot forgive Lyuda for betraying her. But Lyuda claims that she was deceived herself. For the first time in many years, the heroines of the series "Deal" quarrel. Who is playing the game? And who is the victim?
